text: The 1976 AFC Asian Cup was the 6th edition of the men's AFC Asian Cup. The finals were hosted by Iran between 3 and 13 June 1976. The field of six teams was split into two groups of three. Iran won their third title in a row. They beated Kuwait in the final. == References == Category:AFC Asian Cup tournaments Category:1976 in association football Category:1976 in Asia
title: 1976 AFC Asian Cup
